content: mint chocolate bunny by gnathalie2 materials i hook ww yarn- i used caron simply soft in mint and black felt yarn needle embroidery floss eyeballs *this pattern is made holding 2 strands throughout* body *hold 2 strands green together* 6 single_crochet in ring round 1 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 12 single_crochet round 2 2 single_crochet in first single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet around 18 single_crochet round 3 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 18 single_crochet round 4 dec1sc over first 2 single_crochet single_crochet in next 6 single_crochet dec1sc over next 2 single_crochet single_crochet in next 8 single_crochet 16 single_crochet round 5-10 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 16 single_crochet round 11 dec1sc in first 2 single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet around 12 single_crochet slip_stitch in next single_crochet fasten_off weave in ends head *made with 2 strands green yarn* 6 single_crochet in ring round 1 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 12 single_crochet round 2 2 single_crochet in first single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet around 18 single_crochet round 3 2 single_crochet in first single_crochet single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet around 24 single_crochet round 4-7 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 24 round 8 dec1sc over first 2 single_crochet single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet around 18 single_crochet round 9 dec1sc over first 2 single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet around 12 single_crochet round 10 dec1sc around 6 single_crochet fasten_off weave in ends feet make 2 *hold 1 strand of mint and 1 strand of black* 5 single_crochet in ring round 1 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 10 single_crochet round 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 10 single_crochet round 3 dec1sc over next 2 single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet around single_crochet in last single_crochet 7 single_crochet round 4-8 *switch to double green yarn* single_crochet in each single_crochet around 7 single_crochet fasten_off weave in ends arms make 2 start with green/black combo 4 single_crochet in ring round 1 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 8 single_crochet round 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 8 single_crochet round 3 dec1sc over first 2 single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet around 5 single_crochet round 4-8 *switch to double green yarn* single_crochet in each single_crochet around 5 single_crochet fasten_off weave in ends ears make 2 *hold 1 green & 1 black strand together* chain 5 rw 1 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and in each across 4 single_crochet chain 1 turn rw 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet across 4 single_crochet chain 2 turn rw 3 double_crochet in first space double_crochet in each across 2 double_crochet in last single_crochet 6 double_crochet chain 2 turn rw 4 double_crochet in first space double_crochet in each across 2 double_crochet in last double_crochet 8 double_crochet chain 1 turn rw 5-7 single_crochet in each space across chain 1 turn 8 single_crochet rw 8 dec1sc over first 2 single_crochet single_crochet in each single_crochet across slip_stitch in last single_crochet chain 1 turn 6 single_crochet rw 9 dec1sc over first 2 single_crochet single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet slip_stitch in last single_crochet chain 1 turn 4 single_crochet rw 10
